Topic.Title: Do you have what it takes to lead Napoleon Bonaparte to greatness? Sign up now!

Posts.EditableText:
• Hello everyone!

  • I've stumbled on an exciting way to send Squiffy-like games through email, no downloads necessary.

  • Here's a sample of it at work: Click here


If you want to play the rest, sign up with this form: Click Here

Thanks for watching and I look forward to sending you the game!
